Interface IItemManager

All Known Implementing Classes:
ItemManager
public interface IItemManager
Interface for an Item Manager. Defines operations for managing a collection of items, including adding, viewing, updating, deleting, searching, and persisting items to/from a file.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    addItem(int ID, String name, String description, String category, int priority)
    Adds a new item to the manager.
    void
    deleteItem(int ID)
    Deletes an item from the manager based on its ID.
    void
    saveToFile(DLL<Item> Dll)
    Saves items after search to a storage file (e.g., CSV).
    DLL<Item>
    searchItemByCategory(String category)
    Searches for items by their category and displays the results.
    DLL<Item>
    searchItemByName(String name)
    Searches for items by their name and displays the results.
    void
    undoLastDeletion()
    Undoes the last deletion operation, restoring the most recently deleted item.
    void
    updateItem(int ID, String newName, String newDescription, String newCategory, Integer newPriority)
    Updates the details of an existing item.
    void
    viewAllItems()
    Views all items currently managed.
    void
    viewItemById(int id)
    Views the details of a specific item by its ID.

  • Method Details

    • addItem

      boolean addItem(int ID, String name, String description, String category, int priority)
      Adds a new item to the manager.
      Parameters:
      ID - the unique identifier for the item
      name - the name of the item
      description - a description of the item
      category - the category of the item
      priority - the priority of the item
      Returns:
      true if the item was added successfully, false otherwise (e.g., if ID already exists)

    • viewItemById

      void viewItemById(int id)
      Views the details of a specific item by its ID. Output is typically to the console.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the item to view

    • viewAllItems

      void viewAllItems()
      Views all items currently managed. Output is typically to the console, often sorted by priority.

    • updateItem

      void updateItem(int ID, String newName, String newDescription, String newCategory, Integer newPriority)
      Updates the details of an existing item. Only non-null new values will be used for updating.
      Parameters:
      ID - the ID of the item to update
      newName - the new name for the item (or null to keep existing)
      newDescription - the new description for the item (or null to keep existing)
      newCategory - the new category for the item (or null to keep existing)
      newPriority - the new priority for the item (or null to keep existing)

    • deleteItem

      void deleteItem(int ID)
      Deletes an item from the manager based on its ID.
      Parameters:
      ID - the ID of the item to delete

    • undoLastDeletion

      void undoLastDeletion()
      Undoes the last deletion operation, restoring the most recently deleted item.

    • searchItemByName

      DLL<Item> searchItemByName(String name)
      Searches for items by their name and displays the results. Output is typically to the console.
      Parameters:
      name - the name to search for (exact match expected in the current implementation)
      Returns:
      a doubly linked list of items matching the search criteria

    • searchItemByCategory

      DLL<Item> searchItemByCategory(String category)
      Searches for items by their category and displays the results. Output is typically to the console.
      Parameters:
      category - the category to search for (exact match expected in the current implementation)
      Returns:
      a doubly linked list of items matching the search criteria

    • saveToFile

      void saveToFile(DLL<Item> Dll) throws IOException
      Saves items after search to a storage file (e.g., CSV).
      Parameters:
      Dll - the doubly linked list of items to save
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs during saving
